title: DevFest: Call for Speakers
brief: Have expertise you want to share in mobile, web, wearable or cloud computing, machine learning or other emerging technologies. We're looking for demos, talks and workshops. Submit a proposal today!

title: Hackathon Track: Call for Participation
brief: Have an idea for a real-time, mobile or web app with a business value? Want to build and pitch it in 48 hours? Sign up for our hackathon now and work with our mentors to build that MVP

title: GoLang Track: Ultimate Go for Beginners
brief: Ultimate Go is a 2-day workshop for any intermediate-level developer who has some experience with other programming languages and wants to learn Go.
